Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.network

Class ClientNetworkHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.network.ClientNetworkHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewDelegate, java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientNetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ViewDelegate
Brief Handler of the asynchronous interaction between client and server

    • ClientNetworkHandler

      public ClientNetworkHandler​(java.lang.String ip, java.lang.Integer port, View view)
      Brief Initializes the server's ip and port in order to communicate with it and creates a new Analyzer
      Parameters:
      ip - is the server's ip
      port - is the port through which client and server will communicate
      view - is the view reference to pass to the analyzer in order to call the methods on it
